items: Tears now shoot three at a time (triple shot)
Gives the player's tears a homing effect
Tears now have a significant knockback effect
Gives you a very high tear rate in exchange for a big range down
Damage up (extra multiplier if you also have Book of Belial (does not stack with Magic Mushroom multiplier))
A familiar which follows the player and shoots normal tears
All fly enemies are no longer aggressive towards the player
Gives the player 2 orbital flies which block enemy shots
Gives the player an extra life
Deals poison damage on contact with enemies (Damage over time 4 or 6 per tick)
Fully restores all red heart containers
Fully restores all red heart containers
Gives the player the ability to fly
Shows all icons on the map (e.g. Shop)
Does not show the layout of the map
Gives the player the ability to fly for a room
Gives damage up for a room
Stacks with Blood of the Martyr
Does not stack with Magic Mushroom
Guaranteed Devil/Angel Room if possible when used against boss
Deals damage to everything in the room when used
Drops a poop on the floor
Drops a large bomb below the player
Fires 10 tears in a circle around the player
Each tear is equal to your damage stat + 25 flat damage
Freezes all enemies in the current room temporarily
Causes an explosion near the player which damages the player and nearby enemies
Causes all enemies in the current room to run away from the player in fear for a few seconds
A poison bomb which can be thrown and leaves a poison effect on any enemies within the blast radius.
Poison effect does 6 or 8 damage per tick over time
Teleports the player to a random location on the map
Heals the player for one whole red heart
The damage dealt from this item scales with your damage stat
The player's tears now have a piercing effect which allows them to travel through enemies whilst damaging them
Fires a high damage laser in a straight line across the room
Laser damage is based on your damage stat
One full laser deals your tear damage * 7
Higher chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight (Approximately + 20%)
Instead of tears, the player now shoots bombs from his eyes
Poison effects give Dr. Fetus bombs a flat +50 damage
Causes pickups on the floor move towards the player
Reveals the entire map for every floor not including the secret room locations
The player has a random chance to fire another tear out the back of his head
Chance improves based on your luck stat and will always activate at +2 Luck
Drops a pool of 'lemonade' on the floor which damages any enemies that come into contact with it
Gives the player an orbiting fly which deals contact damage to enemies
Gives the player an invulnerability effect which lasts for a few seconds
Allows the player to walk over small gaps
Heals half a heart after every few enemies killed
All spacebar items can now be 'overcharged', allowing them to be charged up twice instead of once
Items in the shop are now -50% off, rounded down to the nearest whole number
Spawns troll bombs at random locations around the room
Slows down all enemies in the current room and their projectiles for a short period of time
A familiar which follows the player around and shoots blood tears
The player's tears are replaced with a laser that has unlimited range and can only fire at right angles
The player can now charge shots for more damage by holding down the fire button
At full charge, your tears do 4 times more damage
Causes the player to shrink in size
Adds several instances of The Bible item into the Boss Room, Shop, Beggar, Secret Room, Gold Chest and Devil Pools
An orbital which blocks shots and damages enemies it comes into contact with
All pills now have a positive or neutral effect
Pills are identified before using them
Reveals the entrance to secret rooms and automatically opens the hole, removing the need for bombs to enter
Gives the player temporary invincibility and allows him to do damage on contact
Higher chance of finding a horsemen boss at the end of the floor
Higher chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight
The player's health is set to 1 but he also gets 8 extra lives
Each time the player dies, he will respawn with 1 Health
Gives the player demon wings and the ability to fly
Gives the player the ability to crush rocks by walking over them
Spawns a trapdoor at the player's feet which allows him to travel to the next floor
Gives the player a random tarot card
When used, spawns a Monstro which will jump on a random enemy in the room
Gives chance to fire 4 tears in 4 directions
Chance is affected by your luck stat and at +7 Luck it will activate every time
A familiar that follows the player and charges forwards, dealing rapid damage on contact
Tears now have a chance of slowing enemies and their projectiles for a short time
Chance is affected by your luck stat and at +15 Luck it will activate every time
Reveals the location of the Secret room, playing a jingle when it is shown
The player transforms into pacman, which makes him invincible and does damage on contact
Everytime you 'eat' an enemy, you regain some health
A bag that floats around following the player and drops a random coin every 2 rooms
A familiar which follows the player and shoots spectral, piercing lasers
A familiar which follows the player and drops half a red heart every 3 rooms
Spawns a random pickup on the floor
Follows the player and drops a soul heart every 4 rooms
A familiar that follows the player and fires black tar tears, which slow enemy movement and projectile speed for a few seconds.
A familiar that follows the player and fires homing tears that deal 3.5 damage each
Gives the player a random pill
Tears now have a chance to apply a poison effect, causing 4 or 6 damage per tick to enemies
Chance is affected by your luck stat and at +12 Luck it will activate every time
Tears now split into two upon contact
Tears that split off from the main tear do less damage (tear damage * 0.25)
Any pedestal item (e.g. an item room item) will be re-rolled into another item
Bombs now do 110 damage (+60, up from 50) and have a larger blast radius
Cuts the player's head from his body for the current room, allowing him to fly and leaving the decapitated body to run around attacking enemies
Lowers all damage taken by half
Damage up for every coin you currently have
At 99 coins this item gives +3.96 Damage up
Tears now have a random chance to freeze enemies in place
Chance is affected by your luck stat
This item causes the player to fart and poison any enemies in close proximity
The Bean deals 26 damage total (5 initially then 21 in a Damage over Time effect
An orbital which does contact damage, blocks shots and increases the speed of all other orbitals
A familiar which follows the player and automatically fires tears that deal 3 damage each at any enemies in close range
Tears are replaced with a knife which can be charged and thrown like a boomerang
Can also do double damage without being thrown as a close range melee weapon
Gives the player spectral tears which allows them to travel through objects in the environment (i.e. rocks)
Automatically gives you 1 bar of charge after using your spacebar item.
Fully recharges your current spacebar item when picked up
Does not stack with the Sharp Plug
When the player takes damage, the dead bird will spawn and attack nearby enemies in the current room
Tears are replaced with a powerful laser that deals 13x damage
Does not directly affect your Damage stat but hits enemies 13 times per charge
Gives you a high rate of fire in exchange for a damage down
When you only have half a heart remaining, you enter a curse state which adds damage and speed
As Eve, this item activates with one FULL heart remaining
Gives a random familiar for the rest of the room
Gives a random spacebar item effect
All of the player's bombs now having a homing effect when placed on the floor
Deals damage to the player in exchange for damage up which lasts for the current room
Refreshes the current floor with brand new rooms, monsters and items
An orbiting fly which deals contact damage
Of the two heart containers given from this item, only 1/2 a red heart of them is filled
Allows the player to fly while the Pony is held.
Sets your speed stat to 1.5 if it isn't already that high
The player will dash across the screen dealing 40 contact damage
Drops a bomb pickup every 2 rooms
Tears gain a damage up and increase in size based on the distance they travel
Removes one heart container and gives you 3 soul hearts
Greatly increases your chance of finding chests at the end of a room, while also reducing your chance to find consumables such as keys and bombs
Takes half a red heart and spawns some coins (the same effect as a blood donation machine)
Places a decoy on the floor which attracts enemies and explodes after a period of time
Bombs no longer automatically explode and will only do so when you activate the remote detonator
The player can now hold two trinkets at the same time
Allows you to pick up more trinkets while also holding The Tick
The player's bombs now leave a poison effect on any enemies
Applies a Damage over Time effect that does 4 or 6 damage per tick
Spawns 7 random coins around the player on the floor
Once per room when you are damaged down to half a heart, you gain a soul heart
A beggar who follows the player and automatically picks up nearby coins
After picking up a coin he has a chance to drop pickups
Gives the player an eternal heart
Can break all rocks, pots and secret room doors in the current room until the player is damaged
Cannot break the stone blocks which appear in the environment
When the player gets hit, a few blue flies will spawn
The player's tears are replaced with explosive poison bombs
Ipecac shots are given a flat +40 Damage on top of normal damage
The player has a random chance to fire a tooth shot instead of a tear
Chance is affected by your luck stat and at +9 Luck it will activate every time
The player has a random chance to spawn a blue fly when one of his tears hits an enemy
Chance is not changed with your Luck stat
The player now also has a laser which fires continuously and does damage very rapidly
Tears now shoot 4 at a time (Quad Shot)
+2 Damage Up for tears fired from Isaac's left eye.
If you have an item which modifies which eye you fire tears from, each shot has a 50% chance to do +2 Damage.
Gives Isaac an eye companion that floats around the room and damages enemies on contact.
When you take damage, this item recharges one room's worth of charge to your spacebar item.
For example, with the D6 you would need to take damage 6 times to fully recharge it.
Each time you take damage, you gain a damage up which lasts for the rest of the floor and turn a darker red colour each time.
After taking 6 hits you will cap at +6.5 Damage for the rest of the floor.
Damage given for each hit increases as follows: +0.5, +0.5, +0.5, +1.66, +1.66, +1.66.
Bloody lust works differently in Rebirth - Damage is given for taking damage and is persistent for the entire floor.
Upon use, reveals the entire map and gives the player a random tarot card, mystic rune or soul heart.
Has a chance to drop from playing a fortune machine.
Gives Isaac the ability to fly and spectral tears.
Creates 5 beams of light at random locations in the room, dealing 20 damage to any enemies which come into contact with them.
The beams tend to favour spawning in the middle of the room but also have a chance to spawn infront of an enemy.
Upon death, the player respawns as Blue Baby with three Soul hearts.
This is a one time use item and all new heart containers will be soul hearts.
Can be used to unlock some of Blue Baby's secrets before having the character available.
Upon taking damage, you have a chance to gain an invulnerability shield for a few seconds.
The chance to gain a shield is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.
A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots spectral tears that deal 3.5 damage.
Can drop while destroying skulls in the Depths and Necropolis floors.
A spacebar item which allows Isaac to fire a blue flame that damages anything in its path for 23 damage per tick.
Can cause up to a total of 184 potential damage.
An item only found in the Boss room pool.
Upon use, re-rolls all pickup consumables in the current room into another random kind of pickup.
This includes hearts, bombs, keys, coins, pills, tarot cards, chests and trinkets.
A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots two normal tears at once in a V-shaped pattern.
Each of Harlequin Baby's tears deal 4 damage.
Tears now become missiles which deal huge damage to anything nearby.
This item places a controllable red target on the ground which will cause a missile to fall from the sky and hit it after a short period of time.
If a tear kills an enemy, it continues to travel forward with the leftover damage.
A shadow follows Isaac and stomps on enemies randomly, dealing 40 damage per stomp.
Upon use, does 10 damage to all enemies in the room and gives them a slowing effect.
Gives Isaac an orbital knife that does extremely high damage on contact with enemies.
The Sacrificial Dagger does block shots in Rebirth, unlike the original game.
Synergises very well with invulnerability items such as Book of Shadows.
Gives Isaac a much higher chance to find soul hearts
A familiar the follows Isaac and fires random tears.
Rainbow Baby's tears can choose from any of the other familiars, such as homing, spectral, tar shots etc.
Upon use, opens all closed doors in the current room, including the ones which require a key to enter and secret room doors.
Can be used to open the golden door that appears in the Dark Room or the Chest.
Using the portable slot takes a coin and has a chance to give a pickup - Exactly the same as how the normal slot machines work.
When Isaac takes damage, the bottle breaks and leaves a pool on the floor which deals damage to enemies which walk over it.
Gives Isaac an eternal heart and the ability to fly.
Taking an eternal heart to the next floor or collecting two on the same floor gives you an extra heart container.
Upon taking damage, Isaac will fart, causing all enemies in close proximity to become poisoned.
Black Bean deals 26 damage total (5 initially then 21 in a Damage over Time effect.
Allows Isaac to fly while the White Pony is held.
Sets your speed stat to 1.5 if it isn't already that high.
Has a spacebar effect which is the same as the Crack the Sky item, which spawns white beams of light from the sky that deal 20 damage to enemies.
The charge of the spacebar attack deals 40 damage on contact with enemies.
Drops from the Conquest boss fight.
Tears are now white, do a lot more damage and move slower across the screen with a homing effect.
Does not increase your damage, simply makes your tears red.
Gives Isaac the ability to fly.
Gives Isaac the ability to fly and spectral tears.
An item only found in the Angel room.
Upon use, takes away one full heart and deals 40 damage to the entire room.
With the Isaac's Heart item, you can use Blood Rights without taking damage.
Follows behind Isaac and can be swung back and forth, dealing contact damage to anything it hits.
Every time the hairball kills an enemy, it grows in size allowing it to deal more damage.
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.
A familiar that mirrors the player's movements and shoots tears in the opposite direction.
Abel's tears do the same as Isaac's base damage (3.5).
Random tear effect for every room.

Possible tear effects: Fire Mind, Spoon Bender, My Reflection, Ouija Board, 20/20, Inner Eye, Iron Bar, Death's Touch, Scorpio, Tough Love, Proptosis, Number One, Mom's Contacts, Ball of Tar, Dark Matter, Speed Ball or Sagittarius.
When used, Isaac gains homing shots for the current room.
Gives Isaac a random tarot card when picked up.
Drops 4 random pills on the floor around Isaac.
Spawns one of each type of pickup.
Pickups spawned: 1 heart, 1 key, 1 bomb, 1 coin, 1 card, 1 pill and 1 trinket.
Higher chance to get more consumable drops from chests.
Tears have a random chance to charm enemies.
Charmed enemies will prioritize attacking other enemies in the room, otherwise they will still attack Isaac.
The chance to charm enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.
Tears now have a chance to concuss enemies, causing them to walk around dazed and confused for a short period of time.
The chance to concuss enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.
Isaac's touch now petrifies enemies, turning them to gold for a few seconds. If an enemy is killed while it is golden, it will drop between 1-4 coins.
All future pennies, keys, bombs and hearts will drop in pairs.
Does not work for soul hearts, nickels, dimes, cards or pills.
When Isaac is hit, there is a chance he will drop a pickup (i.e. coin, bomb, key)
When your spacebar item is out of charge, you can press spacebar to use it at the cost of 2 health.
This item only costs 1/2 a heart to use if you have The Wafer or the Cancer item.
The Sharp Plug will take health from Soul/Black hearts (if any) before taking red hearts.
Causes Isaac's head to detach and orbit his body, blocking shots.
Tears are still fired from Isaac's head but the hitbox remains around his body.
Gives Isaac an orbital ball of bandages that blocks shots, very similar to the Cube of Meat.
Collecting a second Ball of Bandages in the run turns the orbital into a pink head that shoots tears which have a chance to charm enemies.
Getting a third Ball of Bandages will transform the head into bandage girl which will chase enemies while firing charm tears.
A fourth Ball of Bandages will make the Bandage Girl bigger and stronger, making her deal more damage.
Any futher Ball of Bandages will repeat the cycle.
Charmed enemies will prioritize attacking other enemies in the room, otherwise they will still attack Isaac.
Has a chance to drop from one of the Horsemen bosses and can be received from using Monster Manual.
Increases the chance of champion enemies appearing.
An item only found in the Shop room pool.
Bombs now become poop bombs, which deal 10 damage to all enemies in the room and daze them for a short period of time.
If Isaac stands still for a second, he turns to stone, making him invincible until he moves again.
This item is a reference to the Tanuki suit in Super Mario 3.
Creates friendly attack spiders when Isaac is damaged.
When Isaac dies, he has a 50% chance to respawn with 1/2 a heart.
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.
All of Isaac's tears now have a shield, allowing them to block an enemy projectile.
If a tear blocks something, both Isaac's and the enemies tears are destroyed.
When Isaac takes damage, he will start to leave a trail of blood creep behind him as he walks for the current room.
Lazarus' revived form (Lazarus II) respawns with this item.
Gives Isaac a guaranteed devil or angel room on every floor they can appear, even if you have already beaten the boss and it didn't show up originally.
Taking the Goat Head (or any other item) in a Devil Deal significantly lowers your chance for Angel Rooms in the future.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
Isaac now has a chance to create friendly attack spiders everytime he fires a tear.
Can create up to a maximum of 5 spiders in the room at one time.
The Hive Mind item allows Mom's Wig to spawn a maximum of 10 spiders at once instead of 5.
The chance to create a spider is affected by your luck stat and at +10 Luck it will activate every time.
Heals you for 1 red heart when picked up.
Gives the player health regeneration over time.
The given heart container is empty.
When you get hit, you will sometimes cause hearts to drop on the floor.
Everytime a bomb explodes, it will release a circle of tears outwards, much like the Tammy's Head effect.
The tears caused by Sad Bombs are much larger and do a lot more damage than Isaac's normal tears.
Isaac's tears now bounce off walls and objects in the environment, such as rocks and pots.
Allows tears to hit the same enemy multiple times.
If you also have Lost Contact, tears will bounce off enemy projectiles instead of being destroyed.
As you hold down the fire button, shots will float in the same place until you release the fire key again.
Allows you to store up a lot of tears in the air and release them all at once.
When the tears are released, they will fire off in the direction that Isaac was originally facing when it was created.
All explosions now heal Isaac for 1 heart instead of hurting him.
Isaac will also be healed by other sources such as Mom's leg stomp, Satan's leg stomp.
Makes tears break into 4 smaller tears on impact with anything which deal half of your damage.
When getting hit, this item has a chance to drop a soul heart or black heart.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
The chance to spawn a heart is affected by your luck stat and at +22 Luck it will activate 50% of the time.
Due to a bug, if you have more than 22 luck, Gimpy won't drop any Soul or Black hearts.
Enemies have a chance to drop half a heart when killed.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
An item only found in the secret room pool.
When you take damage, 1 or 2 coins will drop on the floor.
Isaac's tears have a 15% chance of causing a fear effect.
Feared enemies will run away from Isaac temporarily.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +85 Luck it will activate every time.
Tears can now be charged and released in a shotgun style effect, much like Monstro's main attack.
On pickup removes all of your red hearts and gives you 6 black hearts.
Tears now have a chance to induce the fear effect, causing enemies to run away from Isaac for a short period.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +85 Luck it will activate every time.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
Isaac leaves a trail of tar behind him which will slow down enemies that walk over it.
Tears have a chance to slow enemies and their projectiles for a short period of time.
The chance to slow enemies can improve based on your luck stat and will always slow enemies at +18 Luck.
Gives a permanent slowing effect to all enemies in the room and their projectiles.
The slowing effect has a reduced effect against Brimstone lasers fired by enemies.
Tears now revolve around Isaac's Body at the distance of an attack fly.
Creates 1-2 friendly spiders when you kill an enemy.
Spiders are spawned at the location where the enemy died.
E. Coli turns normal enemies into poop if they touch you.
Enemies can turn into poop even if they do not do contact damage, allowing you to apply the effect without taking damage.
Can be combined with Midas Touch to turn enemies into Golden Poop.
This does not work on mini-bosses and bosses.
Isaac's tears turn into large scythes that penetrate through enemies (Similar to how Death's scythes look).
Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room.
First half of the key required to enter the door to the Mega Satan boss.
Drops from one of the angels which appear by bombing the statue in an angel room.
Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room.
Second half of the key required to enter the door to the Mega Satan boss.
Drops from one of the angels which appear by bombing the statue in an angel room.
When picked up, this item will increase or decrease each one of your stats by a random amount.
The flavour text for this item is slightly misleading, it is not an all stats up, however will average out as a slight increase overall.
All 6 stats are affected by this item, including shot speed and luck.
Can kill Blue Baby if it removes health.
Doubles your pickup drops including chests, soul hearts and all other consumables which spawn at the end of a room.
Higher chance for 'double trouble' rooms (2 bosses at once).
Puts a shield on Isaac's face making it so he has a high chance to not take damage to projectiles from any direction.
Puts a shield in front of Isaac which blocks projectiles.
Gives Isaac a laser which is positioned in the centre of his head and will fire at random intervals while firing tears.
Each laser does damage equal to your current tear damage.
Luck has no effect on the rate at which Tech.5 fires and does not scale with items that increase your tears stat.
Isaac now shoots from both eyes at the same time.
Unlike the Inner Eye and Mutant Spider items, this double shot item does not give a tears down, effectively giving you double damage per second potential.
Reveals the locations of the secret and super secret room for the current floor and all future floors.
Makes all of Isaac's familiars much bigger, making them deal more damage.
Causes all familiars to deal double damage (x2 / +100%).
Has no effect on Rotten Baby, which instead benefits from Hive Mind.
Causes your friendly blue spiders and flies to become bigger and do 2x more damage.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Allows Mom's Wig to spawn a maximum of 10 spiders at once instead of 5.
Two items now spawn after beating a boss, however only one can be taken.
Unlocked by donating to the donation machine in the shop.
All bomb pickups are now 1+1 bombs.
An item only found in the Shop item pool.
Isaac can now hold 2 tarot cards at once.
All future pill drops (including Mom's Coin Purse) will now instead become Tarot card drops.
An item only available in the Shop room.
Allows for 2 pills to be held.
Drops a pill on the floor when picked up.
All future tarot card drops will now instead become pill drops.
The above stats only apply to tears fired from Isaac's left eye or with a 50% chance if you have an item which causes you to fire from a single source only.
Gives all bombs a burning effect when they explode, leaving fire on the floor which deals 22 damage to enemies.
Isaac's tears now set enemies on fire, leaving a damage over time effect that does 4 or 6 damage per tick.
There is a chance that tears that hit enemies will explode, leaving a small fire on the floor that damages enemies.
The chance for tears to explode is affected by your luck stat and at +13 Luck it will activate every time.
At the start of each floor this item rerolls all your current items, giving you a new item to over-ride each of the one you had.
A reference to the infamous 'Missingno' glitch from Pokemon.
Tears now have a chance to apply the fear effect to enemies, which causes them to run away from Isaac.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +20 Luck it will activate every time.
An item only found in the devil room pool (Note: The Fallen boss pulls items from the Devil Room Pool)
Immunity to all floor curses (e.g. Curse of the Lost)
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
An item that can appear in the shop room or in a Curse Room.
Higher chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight (Approximately +25% through testing).
Gives Isaac damage tears with a short range.
Tear size and damage falls off very fast with this item, the further the tear travels the less damage it does.
Tear damage starts at double (+100%) and decreases over range to roughly (+30%).
Despite the very small tears visually, Proptosis is always a damage up at any range.
Upon taking damage, if the total sum of Isaac's red hearts + soul hearts is under one and a half hearts, the necronomicon effect will activate, dealing 40 damage to the entire room.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
A yellow orbital fly that will block shots and when Isaac gets hit, will seek out the nearest enemy and attack it.
If the fly is in its attacking state and there are no longer any enemies in range, it will return to Isaac and go back to being a defensive orbital.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
A familiar that follows Isaac and blocks any shots that hit it.
If a projectile is blocked by Dry Baby, he has a high chance to activate the Necronomicon effect, dealing 40 damage to the entire room.
The chance to activate the effect is not changed by your Luck stat.
Can drop while destroying skulls in the Depths and Necropolis floors.
A familiar that follows isaac around dropping white creep which slows down enemies that walk over it.
Spawns a familiar blue spider sometimes when you finish a room.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.
A familiar that is controlled via the arrow keys and will automatically fire a laser if anything is in its line of sight.
Robo-Baby 2.0's lasers deal 3.5 damage per hit.
A familiar which follows Isaac and spawns a blue flies.
Rotten Baby can only create one fly at a time, meaning if he has created a fly he cannot make another until it is used.
Blue Flies do 2.0x of Isaac's damage.
The Hive Mind item will cause Rotten Baby's flies to deal double damage.
A familiar that follows Isaac and leaves blood creep on the floor as it floats, hurting enemies that walk over it.
Spawns a familiar leech on the ground that hunts down enemies and heals you for half a heart each time it eats one.
A bag that follows Isaac and drops a random pickup every few rooms (Fixed in patch v1.04).
Can drop any kind of heart, coin, bomb or key.
A large familiar black fly that bounces around the room, exploding on contact with enemies dealing 70 damage.
Does not explode if it hits Isaac, however if it explodes on an enemy while Isaac is in range, he will take damage.
Respawns after a short period of time.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
A green brain that launches in the direction you are firing your tears and will explode on contact with enemies, dealing damage and poisoning anything in the blast radius.
Bob's Brain can deal anywhere between 67.5 - 69.5 damage and this will scale with further bomb upgrade items.
Will hurt Isaac if he is in the blast radius.
When Isaac takes damage, a white attack fly will spawn that orbits him at a similar distance to the Distant Admiration fly.
The fly orbits a lot faster than Distant Admiration or Forever Alone.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
A familiar that follows Isaac and can fire up and charge brimstone shots, exactly how the normal Brimstone item works but with less damage.
A fully charged laser deals 31.5 damage.
A familiar found in the devil room.
Prevents Isaac from taking any damage, but instead summons a familiar heart that follows you around. If the heart is hit, Isaac will take damage.
Sharp Plug becomes useless with this item, due to how damage is prevented on Isaac's body.
A familiar ghost that follows Isaac around and chases enemies close-by, damaging them and causing a fear effect.
A familiar beggar similar to Bum Friend that follows Isaac and collects red hearts, giving Isaac soul hearts or spiders in return.
Soul hearts are the most common payout with only a small chance to spawn friendly or hostile spiders.
Dark Bum has a small chance to give a black heart instead of a soul heart.
For every 1.5 red hearts he takes, he will give 1 heart/spider in return.
A very large orbital that moves around Isaac very slowly, blocking shots and dealing contact damage.
Affects the speed of all other orbitals, slowing them down a lot.
Does not count as one of your three standard orbitals, allowing you to have a total of 4.
Can block and prevent damage from Brimstone lasers.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
An adorable friendly blue spider that walks around the room laying other blue spiders which attack enemies.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.
Spawns a friendly Mulligan that walks around the room. Mulligan can be hit by enemy projectiles, making him a good shield.
Enemies will sometimes target the Mulligan if he is closer.
When used, makes Isaac leap in the air, similar to the leaper enemies.
Maintains momentum if you are already moving in the same direction.
If you already have an item which gives you flying, this item becomes a dash effect instead.
Can be used in the Isaac boss fight to jump over the beams of light he spawns.
When used, rerolls all items you currently own and any pedestal items and pickups in the room.
Has the combined uses of the D4, D6 and D20.
When used, the D4 re-rolls your items into another item from the same pool.
Each time an item is generated by the D4, it is also removed from the pool. When the pool is empty, it will eventually re-roll all your items into heart containers.
When used, rerolls all enemies in the room which are currently alive into another random type of enemy from any floor.
Dangerous to use in early floors, it could replace a basement enemy with something usually found in the Womb only.
When used, copies the effect of the tarot card you are currently holding.
The Blank Card can also be used to mimic mystic runes as well as tarot cards.
An item that often appears in the shop.
When used, you have a chance of getting one of the three following effects: Treasure Map (floor layout), Compass (map icons) or Blue Map (secret room locations)
When used, spawns 2-4 friendly blue spiders on the floor.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.
Allows you to fire a red flame infront of you, similar to the Blue Candle item, however the flame will stay for the current room.
The flame will shrink in size when deals damage to something and eventually disappear.
Isaac can now pick up hearts while at full health, which will be stored in the Jar and can be spawned again using the spacebar.
Up to 4 hearts can be stored in The Jar.
Soul hearts and black hearts cannot be stored.
If used in a Black heart or Eternal heart super secret room, it will spawn the relevant heart.
When used, turns every normal enemy in the room into poop!
Does not work on mini-bosses and bosses.
When used, gives Isaac +1 Black Heart.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
When used, fires a 4 way brimstone laser in all cardinal directions, dealing a lot of damage to any enemies.
Maximum potential damage is 462 (20-21 ticks of 22 damage if the laser makes contact the whole duration)
Laser damage does not scale with your damage stat.
Has a chance to drop after you beat Krampus.
If you get close enough to an enemy that has a large hitbox, you can hit it with 2 of the laser beams, allowing you to deal a lot more damage.
When used, farts on nearby enemies and knocks them backwards away from Isaac.
Upon use, consumes a coin and deals damage to everything in the room.
Damage dealt is equal to your tear damage * 2.
When used, converts 2 soul or black hearts into 1 red heart container.
This item will take from your soul hearts first.
When used, this item will spawn a set of items or consumables based on which floor you are currently on.
Basement 1: 2 Soul hearts. Basement 2: 2 Bombs + 2 Keys.
Caves 1: 1 Boss Item. Caves 2: 1 Boss Item + 2 Soul Hearts.
Sheol: 1 Devil Room Item + 1 Black Heart. Cathedral: 1 Angel Room Item + 1 Eternal Heart.
Pandora's Box considers XL floors to always be the first floor of a chapter.
This item disappears when used (One time use).
When used, turns Isaac invincible and gains +0.28 speed for a few seconds.
You cannot fire tears while the stump is active.
Very similar to the My Little Unicorn item but does not deal contact damage.
While in a hostile room your speed raises at a rate of 0.065 per second.

When you hit a speed stat of 2.0, Isaac will gain the My Little Unicorn invincibility effect for a few seconds, increasing speed and allowing him to run into enemies to deal 40 contact damage per hit.
The time it takes for the effect to activate becomes shorter with a higher base Speed stat.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Gives huge horns which stick out, allowing you to deal 18 contact damage if you hit something with enough speed.
Will not deal contact damage unless you are moving fast enough.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
After getting hit once, you gain a damage reduction for the rest of the room similar to The Wafer item (-50% damage taken).
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Isaac gets a lion's mane and now has the ability to crush rocks by walking over them.
Crushed rocks and poop can fill holes if you walk in their direction.
Allows you to crush Red Poops and sometimes not take damage. However, If you also have flying you will always take damage.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
A random chance when you take damage to get an invincibility shield for a few seconds (Similar to the Celtic Cross effect but more likely).
The chance to get an invincibility shield is affected by your luck stat and at +10 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.
Gives you the PhD effect, turning all negative pills into positive ones.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Gives you 6 keys, 6 bombs and 6 coins.
Balances out your stats to bring the high and low stats closer to an average value.
All future stat upgrading items will now instead spread out across all other stats. For example, an item which usually gives +1 Damage would instead give a small 'all stats up'.
Stats effected by this item are: Damage, Tears, Range, Speed.
When taken with another item which gives an extreme value in a certain stat (e.g. Soy Milk) can lead to interesting synergies.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Isaac's tears turn bright green and always apply a poison effect to enemies which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick.
Gives Dr. Fetus bombs a big increase in damage.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Tears now turn into arrow heads and pierce through enemies.
Tears do not travel through rocks with this item.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Leaves a trail of tears on the floor behind Isaac which damages enemies that walk over it.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Tears now have a knockback effect, which pushes enemies backwards.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Tears Down by exactly half (Tear delay * 2)
The tears down from this item is a x2.0 multiplier after the formula, meaning it will always halve your tear rate (Unless you have Monstro's Lung or Soy Milk).
When you die with this item, you respawn in the previous room as 'Black Judas' with 2 black hearts for health.
When you revive, your base damage is set to 7. (Double Isaac's 3.5 base damage)
All future red hearts now heal for double. Half hearts heal a whole heart and full hearts heal 2 red hearts.
Each time you enter a new room, damage is negated for the first time you get hit.
Can be used to go in and out of a Curse Room without taking damage.
You can now break poop, rocks and skulls by walking over them.
Allows you to crush Red Poops and sometimes not take damage. However, If you also have flying you will always take damage.
Enemies and pickups (keys, bombs etc.) are now magnetically attracted to Isaac's tears.
Can cause some enemies to have unpredictable movement.
Tears are now charged up and fired rapidly in a burst of up to 4 shots at once.
The amount of tears fired in the charge depends on how long you charge for.

The eye has three states, white (not firing), black (first second of charging) and blinking between black and white. If you get hit while Cursed eye is a solid black colour you are guaranteed to be teleported to another random room on the floor. If you get hit in either of the other 2 states you will not be teleported.
When Isaac's tears hit anything, they leave a green toxic creep on the floor that damages enemies.
A familar that is attached to Isaac, which will seek out and damage any enemies close by.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
A familiar eye that bounces around the room slowly and fires tears in the same direction as Isaac.
Cain's Other Eye deals 3.5 damage per tear (The same as Isaac's base damage).
A familiar fly that can be moved around via use of the arrow keys dealing contact damage, similar to the Ludovico Technique's mechanic.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
An iron ball and chain attached to Isaac, very similar to Guppy's Hairball that you can fling around to deal damage.
The ball will block enemy shots and can also destroy environmental objects such as rocks, mushrooms and skulls.
Does not decrease your movement speed stat but will cause you to become slower due to its weight.
A familiar that will follow Isaac and copy the effect of one of your other familiars.
If you don't have any other familiars, he will just shoot normal tears.
A spacebar item that fires 8 of Isaac's tears in a circle around him.
Upon use, teleports you to one of the following rooms at random: Item room, Secret room, Super secret room, the I AM ERROR room or the Black Market (very low chance).

Allows you to loop through and the final floor infinitely. If you can get Undefined to teleport you to an I AM ERROR room, there will be a beam of light that takes you back to a new Chest/Dark Room floor with the same layout and refreshed rooms.
Similar to the Pinking Shears, when used will cut your head from your body, however this item allows you to control Isaac's body.
Isaac's detached head will remain stationary and shoot tears in the direction you are firing.
While you hold the spacebar down with this item, it will de-charge gradually and when the charge bar gets to zero it will grant you a brief period of invincibility.
If the spacebar is held for too long (about 1 second) when it has no charge, you will take damage.
Gives Isaac an invincibility shield for a few seconds when hit down to 1/2 heart remaining.
Gives you access to the Chest floor.
When unlocked, is guaranteed to drop after the Mom's Foot boss fight.
Damages all enemies in the room when hit down to 1/2 heart remaining.
Gives you access to the Dark Room floor.
When unlocked, is guaranteed to drop after the Mom's Foot boss fight.
You no longer shoot tears and instead now control a single large tear with the arrow keys.
Items which increase your tears stat will cause the tear to deal damage at a faster rate.
Items which increase your shot speed cause the tear to travel faster across the screen.
Ludo and Brimstone create a large controllable red ring of death that does massive damage to anything in its path.
Taking this with Mom's Knife allows you to remote control the knife around the room, dealing huge damage.
Isaac's tears become homing and have a large aura around them, which will deal a lot of damage to anything inside its radius.
Gives Isaac an extra life on death, exactly the same as Lazarus' default respawn effect.
When you die with this item, you respawn in the same room with 1 heart and the Anemic item.
The game considers you to be a different character (Lazarus II) when this effect activates.
Gives Isaac a full mapping effect, revealing the entire floor and locations of all secret rooms.
The three heart containers are pre-filled with red hearts.
Enemy projectiles will now slowly curve away from Isaac and avoid hitting him.
Isaac's tears become large, brown and will penetrate all objects and enemies (piercing + spectral).
Upon entering a new room, you now have a chance to randomly slow down or speed up all enemies in the room.
An item only found in the Shop item pool.
A blue boomerang which can be thrown in a similar fashion to Mom's Knife, to stun any enemies it hits and deal 7 damage.
The boomerang can also be used to grab pickups and consumables from a distance, similar to the legend of zelda boomerang.
The range of the boomerang is affected by range, with number one the distance is very short and makes the item a lot less effective.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
Gives you a random pill when picked up.
An item only found in the boss room pool.
An item only found in the Boss Room pool.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
cards: Teleports the player to the starting room of the current floor.
Gives the player the Spoon Bender effect for the current room.
Causes Mom's foot to stomp on a random enemy in the room. If there are no enemies, Mom's foot will stomp on the player.
Gives the player the Whore of Babylon effect for the current room.
Teleports the player to the boss room of the current floor.
Gives the player the My Little Unicorn effect for the current room.
Spawns one of each type of consumable.
Teleports the player to the shop of the current floor. If there is no shop, acts as a random teleport.
Spawns a slot machine or a fortune teller.
Gives the player the Magic Mushroom effect for the current room.
Gives the player the Transcendence effect for the current room.
Same effect as the Book of Belial.
Same effect as the Anarchist Cookbook.
Teleports the player to the treasure room of the current floor. If there is no treasure room, acts as a random teleport.
Teleports the player to the secret room of the current floor.
Restores health, and has the same effect as the Necronomicon, the Compass, and the Treasure Map for the current floor.
Same effect as the Compass and the Treasure Map for the current floor.
Doubles the player's bombs. If the player has no bombs, gives two bombs.
Doubles the player's coins. If the player has no coins, gives two coins.
Doubles the player's keys. If the player has no keys, gives two keys.
Doubles the player's red hearts. Does not add new heart containers.
Teleports the player to the devil room or the angel room of the current floor.
Can be thrown, killing anything in its path.
Allows all items in the room to be picked up for free.
Shows a cryptic message, like a fortune teller.
Slowly covers the current room in poop.
Kills the player, but spawns a ten of any items, consumables, or chests.
trinkets: Spawns a penny upon taking damage.
Increases the chance for poop to drop consumables.
Causes all active items to automatically recharge one slot.
Teleports the player to a random room when any active item is used.
Increases the chance for boss challenge rooms and champion enemies.
Pulls coins towards the player, but no other consumables.
Increases the chance to find angel rooms and eternal hearts.
Gives the player a chance to trigger The Gamekid effect upon taking damage.
Causes shots to pulse in size.
Causes shots to move in waves.
Causes shots to move in circles.
Causes shots to appear wider. Gives shots a knockback effect.
Gives the player one free shop purchase. Disappears on use.
Prevents damage from creep and spikes.
Spawns a penny upon breaking obstacles.
Causes Mom's foot to stomp in a random place in the current room, every minute.
Increases the chance to find black hearts.
Increases the chance to find eternal hearts.
Opens all golden chests for free.
Gives the player a black heart upon taking damage that leaves the player with less than one heart. Disappears after three uses.
Gives a chance to trigger the effect of The Polaroid or The Negative upon taking damage that leaves the player with less than one heart.
Causes most heart consumables to turn into black hearts.
Causes a puzzle piece to appear on the player's last will if they die in a sacrifice room.
Causes the player to fart upon picking up a coin.
Causes the player to randomly fart and poop.
Causes shots to move at alternating right angles. Range up.
Gives a chance to be revived as ???.
Spawns a blue fly upon taking damage.
Gives a chance to shoot poison shots.
Gives a chance to shoot piercing and spectral shots.
Gives a chance to trigger the effect of Mini Mush, both Odd Mushrooms, or The Compass for the current room.
Spawns a Little Steven familiar upon taking damage that leaves the player with less than one heart.
Increases the chance to find red hearts.
Increases the chance to find keys and golden chests.
Increases the chance for heart drops to be soul hearts.
Gives a chance for a damage up for the current room upon taking damage.
Increases the chance to find bombs.
Teleports the player to the last cleared room upon taking damage leaving the player with less than one heart.
Increases the chance to find pills.
Increases the chance to find cards.
Gives a chance to heal the player for half a heart upon clearing the current room.
pills: Deals one heart of damage to the player. If the player has less than one heart of health, restores all health.
Gives the player two soul hearts.
Switches the player's bombs and keys.
Spawns five troll bombs around the player.
Removes one heart container. If the player only has one heart container, adds a heart container.
Teleports the player to a random room.
Restores the player's active item. Spawns one or two battery consumables.
Empties all but one heart container, and spawns one to four red hearts.
Freezes the player for a second.
Opens all the entrances to the secret and super secret rooms.
Charms all enemies in the current room.
Triggers the curse of the lost for the current floor.
Spawns a large creep pool around the player.
Causes shots to move diagonally for about a minute.
runes: Breaks all breakable objects in the current room.
Clones all items, consumables, and chests in the current room. Cloned items will use the same item pools as their originals.
Removes any curses from the current floor besides curse of the labyrinth. Gives the player a soul heart.
Same effect as the Compass, the Treasure Map, and the Blue Map for the current floor.
Spawns three blue flies and three blue spiders.
Gives the player an invulnerability effect for 30 seconds.
